title: Morning Facial Massage
description: A gentle 5-minute routine to boost circulation and reduce puffiness
steps: Wash your hands thoroughly and apply a small amount of facial oil
Start with gentle circular motions from your forehead down to your temples
Use upward strokes along your cheeks towards your ears
Gently massage under your eyes with your ring finger
Finish with gentle tapping motions all over your face

title: Lymphatic Drainage
description: Target lymph nodes to reduce swelling and promote detoxification
steps: Apply gentle pressure to lymph nodes behind your ears
Sweep downward from ears to collarbone
Use light pressure to massage from center of face outward
Gently press and release around jawline
End with downward strokes along the neck

title: Eye Area Refresh
description: Specialized movements to target fine lines and dark circles
steps: Use ring finger to gently tap around the eye area
Make small circles from inner corner to outer corner
Gently press and lift the eyebrow area
Use pinching motions along the eyebrow
Finish with cooling cucumber slices for 2 minutes

title: Cheek Lifting Technique
description: Targeted movements to lift and tone cheek muscles
steps: Place palms on cheeks and lift upward gently
Use fingertips to make circular motions on cheekbones
Pinch along the jawline from chin to ears
Apply upward pressure while smiling
Hold smile for 10 seconds, repeat 5 times

title: Jawline Sculpting
description: Define and strengthen your jawline with targeted exercises
steps: Place thumbs under chin and apply gentle upward pressure
Move fingers along jawline from chin to ears
Use knuckles to massage along the jaw
Open mouth wide, then close slowly - repeat 10 times
Finish with gentle circular motions at jaw joints

title: Forehead Smoothing
description: Reduce tension and smooth forehead lines
steps: Place fingers on forehead and smooth outward to temples
Use gentle upward strokes from eyebrows to hairline
Apply light pressure to release tension points
Raise eyebrows and hold for 5 seconds, repeat 8 times
End with soothing circular motions at temples

title: Full Face Glow Routine
description: Complete 10-minute routine for radiant, healthy-looking skin
steps: Begin with gentle cleansing and apply facial oil
Start with forehead smoothing techniques
Move to eye area refresh exercises
Perform cheek lifting and jawline sculpting
Complete with lymphatic drainage movements
Finish with gentle tapping all over face
